item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: 7 AUDITS
It's been less than a year since we proposed Aligned to solve the problems associated with proof verification in Ethereum. Since then, we have gone through three testnets and the security audits performed by four teams: Consensys, Fuzzing Labs, Least Authority, and Trail of Bits.
Their findings and suggestions have helped improve not only the security and reliability of Aligned, but also the code quality. All critical and major points in the audits have been addressed, and we have improved the telemetry and reliability of Aligned.
Find more information here: https://blog.alignedlayer.com/summary-of-the-security-audits-for-our-proof-verification-layer/
item.dc:creator: @alignedlayer
item.description:
7 AUDITS

It's been less than a year since we proposed Aligned to solve the problems associated with proof verification in Ethereum. Since then, we have gone through three testnets and the security audits performed by four teams: Consensys, Fuzzing Labs, Least Authority, and Trail of Bits.

Their findings and suggestions have helped improve not only the security and reliability of Aligned, but also the code quality. All critical and major points in the audits have been addressed, and we have improved the telemetry and reliability of Aligned.

Find more information here: blog.alignedlayer.com/summarâ€¦

item.title:
Working on the new website.
Weâ€™re gonna add at some point a betty fast consensus that only executes the verifiers and posts the results in Ethereum.
Then we will add a slow mode that does proof aggregation.
Finally we will build multiple products on top of @alignedlayer.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Working on the new website.

Weâ€™re gonna add at some point a betty fast consensus that only executes the verifiers and posts the results in Ethereum.

Then we will add a slow mode that does proof aggregation.

Finally we will build multiple products on top of @alignedlayer.

item.title: RT by @fede_intern: we just released a new version of the @alignedlayer. it still needs some improvements not only on the general information but also as a tool to help developers. we will start iterating faster on it. if you have any feedback please feel free to share it.
item.dc:creator: @rj_aligned
item.description:
we just released a new version of the @alignedlayer.
it still needs some improvements not only on the general information but also as a tool to help developers.
we will start iterating faster on it.
if you have any feedback please feel free to share it.
